entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 04:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Drizzle early this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
